==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=步摇}}

===Etymology===
[[步]] ([[step]]) + [[搖]] (to [[sway]] back and forth)
: this type of headpiece had dangling gold and pearl pieces which would sway back and forth as one walked.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=bùyáo
|c=bou6 jiu4
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} a type of head ornament that was inserted just beneath a hair bun, it had gold and pearls which dangled from it as one walked
#* '''806:''' [[w:Bai Juyi|Bai Juyi]], ''[[s:Song of Everlasting Regret|Song of Everlasting Regret]]''
#*: [[雲鬢]][[花顏]][[金]]'''步搖'''
#*:: ''She had dark black hair, and the face of a flower, with golden '''jewelry dangling from her hair'''''
